entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Black Diamond 01:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -20.1°C
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.3°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
